Sentencas: The surface chemistry of pemvskite-type lanthanum transition metal oxides is an important parameter in high-temperature electrochemical devices such as solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Surface analysis of lanthanum strontium cobalt oxides under cathodic polarization at high temperature through operando total-reflection X-ray absorption and X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy

Sentencas: Strontium segregation on the surface of lanthanum strontium cobalt oxides (LSC) may lead to poor oxygen reduction kinetics.
Titulo: Surface analysis of lanthanum strontium cobalt oxides under cathodic polarization at high temperature through operando total-reflection X-ray absorption and X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy

Sentencas: However, previous studies have not sufficiently addressed the oxide surface chemistry, including the oxidation change of LSC under cathodic polarization.
Titulo: Surface analysis of lanthanum strontium cobalt oxides under cathodic polarization at high temperature through operando total-reflection X-ray absorption and X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy

Sentencas: In this study, operando total-reflection X-ray fluorescence absorption and X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy were performed to investigate cathodic polarization at high temperature (773 K) and at 1 atm pressure.
Titulo: Surface analysis of lanthanum strontium cobalt oxides under cathodic polarization at high temperature through operando total-reflection X-ray absorption and X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy

Sentencas: Dense thin-film electrodes of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 (LSC113) on Zr0.92Y0.08O1.96 electrolytes with a gadolinium-doped ceria interlayer were examined as model SOFC cathodes.
Titulo: Surface analysis of lanthanum strontium cobalt oxides under cathodic polarization at high temperature through operando total-reflection X-ray absorption and X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy

Sentencas: This may be the first time that predominant surface reduction of cobalt is directly observed by using LSC113 under cathodic polarization.
Titulo: Surface analysis of lanthanum strontium cobalt oxides under cathodic polarization at high temperature through operando total-reflection X-ray absorption and X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy

Sentencas: This phenomenon is related to strontium enrichment on the LSC surface.
Titulo: Surface analysis of lanthanum strontium cobalt oxides under cathodic polarization at high temperature through operando total-reflection X-ray absorption and X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy

Sentencas: (La0.5Sr0.5)(2)CoO4 decoration on LSC113 enhanced the oxygen reduction kinetics compared with that of bare LSC113.
Titulo: Surface analysis of lanthanum strontium cobalt oxides under cathodic polarization at high temperature through operando total-reflection X-ray absorption and X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy

Sentencas: This is due to the suppression of cobalt surface reduction and Sr enrichment in the LSC113 phase.
Titulo: Surface analysis of lanthanum strontium cobalt oxides under cathodic polarization at high temperature through operando total-reflection X-ray absorption and X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy
